content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-14.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) with a drop position at (-14.5, -48.5)
- Iron Chest at position (-16.5, -48.5) and Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-15.5, -48.5) transferring items from the iron chest to the wooden chest
- Additional Burner Inserters at positions (-14.5, -46.5) and (-14.5, -45.5) for item transfer
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5) for storage

### Iron Plate Storage Facility at Position (44.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron Chest at position (44.5, -80.5) for storing iron plates
- Iron Chest at position (45.5, -80.5) for additional storage
- Iron Chest at position (47.5, -80.5) and (49.5, -80.5) for coal storage

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) with a drop position at (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Inserters at positions (40.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), and (43.5, -80.5) for transferring items
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) for storage

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities without inventory
- Ensure you have the required entity in your inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors when extracting items due to incorrect attribute access
- Verify that the correct object attributes are being accessed during extraction operations.

### Errors when transferring items due to missing entities
- Confirm that the target entity exists at the specified position before attempting to transfer items.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
